name: Hurricane Productions - Touring Theatre
description:
Welcome to Hurricane Productions the UK’s leading touring theatre company, we pride ourselves on our outstanding theatrical shows, professional actors and unrivalled reliability. All our shows are written in-house by Marie O'Hara for children aged 3-11 years.

South East Arts Award - Best Children's Entertainment 2012

LIKE US: Hurricane Theatre Facebook

FOLLOW US: @HurricanePantos on Twitter

VIEW US: For our promo video, click here http://youtu.be/hCb4d5f7ou4

BOOK US: 0800 731 2677


We specialise in bringing the wonders of live theatre to your venue. We bring scenery, beautiful costumes, magic tricks and audience participation! With our adaptable scenery we can perform in any size venue to absolutely any size audience.

All of our actors are professionally trained, selected from the countries leading drama schools; Italia Conti, Mountview, Guildford School of Acting, DSL and BSA

We tour throughout the UK and our sister company English theatre tours, will be touring throughout Europe next summer.

Established for 20 years, we have performed to 3 million primary school children at 15,000 venues throughout the UK!

Over 15% of all adults under 25 year olds in the UK have seen one of our shows.
Whether a school, Business, leisure centre, sports club or party, let us come and entertain you.
companyAddress: Hurricane Productions Ltd, 5-6 Crescent Stables, London,  SW15 2TN, GB
specialties: Touring Theatre, Entertainment, Drama, Educational Theatre, Theatrical Productions, School Productions, Theatre, Children's Entertainment, Pantomime, Casting, and Plays

name: Patients Know Best
description:
Founded in 2008 as a social enterprise, we believe empowering patients with their health data improves individual outcomes and enables more efficient, sustainable healthcare systems. Our mission is to make this a reality by giving everyone access to their Personal Health Record (PHR), enabling them to control who sees it, understand what it means, and become a partner in managing their health.
Our single patient record is the foundation. It seamlessly integrates data from diverse sources—healthcare providers, devices, and patient contributions—and delivers the data wherever the patient needs it—through robust read-write APIs and with dedicated interfaces for patients and professionals. 
All of this is governed by the patient. Our intuitive patient interface provides comprehensive access to appointments, documents, test results, and care plans, alongside crucial consent and secure sharing management.
As one of the UK's first B Corporations (certified 2015), social and environmental responsibility is central to our identity. Our platform fosters sustainable healthcare by shifting from reactive treatment to proactive, preventative care. Informed patients manage conditions better, leading to improved long-term health and efficient resource use. Our digital-first approach also reduces healthcare's environmental footprint through less travel and paper.
In the UK, PKB serves over 5 million registered patients, delivering 20+ million test results monthly. We completed national integration with all Dutch providers in 2022 and GP data integration for all adults in England in Spring 2025.   Our seamless integration with the NHS App provides a single front door for NHS patients, registering 100,000 patients a month.  From our established presence across the UK and EU to our recent expansion into Africa, our vision remains the same: to ensure every person has the power to improve their health through control of their data.
tagLine: Transforming Healthcare with a Single Patient Record | The World's Largest Personal Health Platform
companyAddress: St John's Innovation Centre, Cambridge, Cambs CB4 0WS, GB
specialties: software, personal health records, and phr
